instructions: Open the Settings app . Scroll down the list and tap Advanced features . Tap Side key . Galaxy S20 side key settings Source: Hayato Huseman / Android Central Under Press and hold, tap the circle next to Power off menu . You can also adjust the action of double-tapping the side key. By default it launches the camera; you can set it to open Bixby, or tap Open app to launch a different app. Tap the gear icon next to Open app to specifiy which app double-tapping the side key launches.
